name: Sarwar
text: I swear by (the angels) who stand in ranks,

name: Sarwar
text: by those who drive away the devil (to protect Our revelation),

name: Sarwar
text: and those who recite Our revelations,

name: Sarwar
text: that your Lord is the only Lord.

name: Sarwar
text: He is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, the Lord of the Eastern regions.

name: Sarwar
text: We have decked the lower heavens with stars

name: Sarwar
text: to protect them from the rebellious satan.

name: Sarwar
text: The devils cannot hear those high above. They would be struck from all sides

name: Sarwar
text: and driven away to suffer the necessary torment.

name: Sarwar
text: Some of them who stealthily steal words from the heavens are pursued by a glistening flame.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), ask them, "Have they (people) been created stronger than what We have created?" We have created them from moist clay.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), you will be surprised that they still mock (God's revelations).

name: Sarwar
text: They pay no attention when they are reminded

name: Sarwar
text: and when they see a miracle, they mock

name: Sarwar
text: it and say, "It is only plain magic".

name: Sarwar
text: They say, "Shall we be brought to life again after we die and turn into dust and bones?

name: Sarwar
text: Will our forefathers also be brought to life again?"

name: Sarwar
text: Say, "You will certainly be brought back to life in disgrace".

name: Sarwar
text: The Day of Judgment will come within a single roar and they will remain gazing at it.

name: Sarwar
text: They will say, "Woe to us!" (They will be told), "This is the day of receiving recompense".

name: Sarwar
text: This is the Day of Judgment in which you disbelieved.

name: Sarwar
text: (God will command the angels), "Gather together the unjust, their spouses, and what they had worshipped

name: Sarwar
text: besides God, and show them the way of hell.

name: Sarwar
text: Stop them. They must be questioned."

name: Sarwar
text: They will be asked, "Why do you not help each other?"

name: Sarwar
text: In fact, on that day they will be submissive.

name: Sarwar
text: They will turn to each other saying,

name: Sarwar
text: "It was you who tried to mislead us from righteousness".

name: Sarwar
text: Others will respond, "It was you who did not want to have any faith.

name: Sarwar
text: We had no authority over you, in fact, you were a rebellious people.

name: Sarwar
text: Thus, the words of Our Lord about us have come true and now we are suffering the torment.

name: Sarwar
text: We mislead you and we ourselves had also gone astray."

name: Sarwar
text: On that day they will all share the torment.

name: Sarwar
text: This is how We deal with the criminals.

name: Sarwar
text: They were the ones, who on being told, "God is only One," become puffed-up with pride

name: Sarwar
text: and said, "Should we give up our idols for the sake of an insane poet".

name: Sarwar
text: In fact, he had brought them the truth and had acknowledged the Messengers (who were sent before him).

name: Sarwar
text: (They will be told), "You will certainly suffer the painful torment

name: Sarwar
text: and will be recompensed only for what you deserve.

name: Sarwar
text: But the sincere servants of God

name: Sarwar
text: will have their determined sustenance

name: Sarwar
text: and fruits while they are honored.

name: Sarwar
text: (They will live) in the bountiful gardens,

name: Sarwar
text: on couches facing each other.

name: Sarwar
text: They will be served with a cup full of crystal clear wine,

name: Sarwar
text: delicious to those who drink it

name: Sarwar
text: but not harmful or intoxicating.

name: Sarwar
text: They will have with them loving wives with big black and white eyes

name: Sarwar
text: who are as chaste as sheltered eggs.

name: Sarwar
text: They will turn to each other and ask questions.

name: Sarwar
text: One of them will say, "I had a companion who asked me,

name: Sarwar
text: 'Do you believe in the Day of Judgment?

name: Sarwar
text: Shall we be recompensed for our deeds after we die and become bones and dust?

name: Sarwar
text: Do you want to see him?' "

name: Sarwar
text: He will look down and see him in hell.

name: Sarwar
text: He will say to his friend in hell, "By God, you almost destroyed me.

name: Sarwar
text: Had I not the guidance of my Lord, I would certainly have been brought into torment".

name: Sarwar
text: He will ask his companion, "Did you not say that there would only be one death

name: Sarwar
text: and that we would not be punished?"

name: Sarwar
text: This is certainly the greatest triumph

name: Sarwar
text: for which one must strive hard.

name: Sarwar
text: Is this not a better reward than the tree of Zaqqum

name: Sarwar
text: which We have made as a torment for the unjust?

name: Sarwar
text: (Zaqqum) is a tree which grows from the deepest part of hell,

name: Sarwar
text: and its fruits are like the heads of devils.

name: Sarwar
text: The dwellers of hell will eat that fruit and fill-up their bellies.

name: Sarwar
text: Then they will have on top of it a mixture of boiling water.

name: Sarwar
text: They can only return to hell.

name: Sarwar
text: They found their father going astray

name: Sarwar
text: and rushed to follow them.

name: Sarwar
text: Most of the ancient people had also gone astray.

name: Sarwar
text: We had certainly sent warners to them.

name: Sarwar
text: See how terrible was the end of those who were warned.

name: Sarwar
text: Only Our sincere servants were saved.

name: Sarwar
text: Noah called for help. How blessed was the answer which he received.

name: Sarwar
text: We rescued him and his people from the greatest affliction

name: Sarwar
text: and We made his offspring the only survivors.

name: Sarwar
text: We perpetuated his praise in later generations.

name: Sarwar
text: Peace be with Noah among all men in the worlds.

name: Sarwar
text: Thus do We reward the righteous ones.

name: Sarwar
text: He was one of Our believing servants.

name: Sarwar
text: We drowned all the others (besides Noah and his people).

name: Sarwar
text: Abraham was one of his followers.

name: Sarwar
text: He turned to his Lord with a sound heart

name: Sarwar
text: and asked his father and his people, "What is that you worship?

name: Sarwar
text: Do you want to worship false idols as your lords besides God?

name: Sarwar
text: What do you think about the Lord of the Universe?"

name: Sarwar
text: The people invited him to attend their feast). Then he looked at the stars

name: Sarwar
text: and said, "I am sick!"

name: Sarwar
text: All the people turned away from him

name: Sarwar
text: and he turned to their idols and asked them, "Do you eat?

name: Sarwar
text: Why do you not speak?"

name: Sarwar
text: He struck them with his right hand.

name: Sarwar
text: Thereupon the people came running to him.

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "How can you worship what you yourselves have carved

name: Sarwar
text: even though God created both you and that which you have made?"

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Let us build a fire and throw him into the flames".

name: Sarwar
text: They plotted against him, but We brought humiliation upon them.

name: Sarwar
text: (Abraham) said, "I will go to my Lord who will guide me".

name: Sarwar
text: Abraham prayed, "Lord, grant me a righteous son".

name: Sarwar
text: We gave him the glad news of the birth of a forbearing son.

name: Sarwar
text: When his son was old enough to work with him, he said, "My son, I have had a dream that I must sacrifice you. What do you think of this?" He replied, "Father, fulfill whatever you are commanded to do and you will find me patient, by the will of God".

name: Sarwar
text: When they both agreed and Abraham had lain down his son on the side of his face (for slaughtering),

name: Sarwar
text: We called to him, "Abraham,

name: Sarwar
text: you have fulfilled what you were commanded to do in your dream." Thus do We reward the righteous ones.

name: Sarwar
text: It was certainly an open trial.

name: Sarwar
text: We ransomed his son with a great sacrifice

name: Sarwar
text: and perpetuated his praise in later generations.

name: Sarwar
text: Peace be with Abraham.

name: Sarwar
text: Thus, do We reward the righteous ones.

name: Sarwar
text: He was one of Our believing servants.

name: Sarwar
text: We gave him the glad news of the birth of Isaac, one of the righteous Prophets.

name: Sarwar
text: We had blessed him and Isaac. Some of their offspring were righteous and others were openly unjust to themselves.

name: Sarwar
text: We certainly bestowed Our favor upon Moses and Aaron

name: Sarwar
text: and saved them and their people from great distress.

name: Sarwar
text: We helped them and they were victorious.

name: Sarwar
text: We gave them the enlightening Book,

name: Sarwar
text: guided them to the right path,

name: Sarwar
text: and perpetuated their praise in later generations.

name: Sarwar
text: Peace be with Moses and Aaron.

name: Sarwar
text: Thus do We reward the righteous ones.

name: Sarwar
text: They were two of Our believing servants.

name: Sarwar
text: Elias was certainly a Messenger.

name: Sarwar
text: He told his people, "Why do you not have fear of God?

name: Sarwar
text: Do you worship Ba`al and abandon the Best Creator.

name: Sarwar
text: who is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?"

name: Sarwar
text: They called him a liar. Thus, all of them will suffer torment

name: Sarwar
text: except the sincere servants of God.

name: Sarwar
text: We perpetuated his praise in the later generations.

name: Sarwar
text: Peace be with the followers of Elias.

name: Sarwar
text: In this way do We reward the righteous ones.

name: Sarwar
text: He was one of Our believing servants.

name: Sarwar
text: Lot was certainly a Messenger.

name: Sarwar
text: We rescued him and his whole family,

name: Sarwar
text: except for an old woman who remained behind.

name: Sarwar
text: Then We totally destroyed the others.

name: Sarwar
text: You pass by (their ruined town) in the morning and at night.

name: Sarwar
text: Will you then not understand?

name: Sarwar
text: Jonah was certainly a Messenger.

name: Sarwar
text: He abandoned his people

name: Sarwar
text: and sailed away in a laden ship, wherein people cast lots. Because he lost, he was thrown into the water.

name: Sarwar
text: The fish swallowed him up and he deserved (all this).

name: Sarwar
text: Had he not glorified God,

name: Sarwar
text: he would certainly have remained inside the fish until the Day of Resurrection.

name: Sarwar
text: We cast him out of the fish unto dry land and he was sick.

name: Sarwar
text: We made a plant of gourd grow up for him.

name: Sarwar
text: We sent him to a hundred thousand or more people.

name: Sarwar
text: They believed in him so We granted them enjoyment for an appointed time.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), ask them, "Do daughters belong to your Lord and sons to them?

name: Sarwar
text: Have We created the angels as females before their very eyes?

name: Sarwar
text: It is only because of their false invention that they say,

name: Sarwar
text: 'God has begotten a son.' They are certainly liars.

name: Sarwar
text: Has He chosen daughters in preference to sons?

name: Sarwar
text: Woe to you! How terrible is your Judgment.

name: Sarwar
text: Do you not understand?

name: Sarwar
text: Do you have clear authority?

name: Sarwar
text: Bring your book if what you say is true.

name: Sarwar
text: They have said that there is a relationship between Him and the jinn. The jinn certainly know that they will all be brought to suffer torment.

name: Sarwar
text: God is too glorious to be described as they describe Him

name: Sarwar
text: except the servants of God, sincere and devoted.

name: Sarwar
text: You and whatever you worship

name: Sarwar
text: cannot mislead anyone

name: Sarwar
text: except those who are doomed to enter hell.

name: Sarwar
text: The angels say, "Each of us has an appointed place.

name: Sarwar
text: We stand in ranks (for prayer)

name: Sarwar
text: and we glorify God".

name: Sarwar
text: Even though they (unbelievers) say,

name: Sarwar
text: "Had we received guidance from the people living before us,

name: Sarwar
text: we would have certainly been sincere servants of God".

name: Sarwar
text: They have rejected the Quran. They will soon know the consequences (of their disbelief).

name: Sarwar
text: We decreed that Our Messenger servants

name: Sarwar
text: will certainly be victorious

name: Sarwar
text: and that Our army will be triumphant.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), stay away from them for a while

name: Sarwar
text: and watch them. They, too, will watch.

name: Sarwar
text: Do they want to suffer Our torment immediately?

name: Sarwar
text: When it descends into their courtyard, it will be terrible for those who have already been warned.

name: Sarwar
text: Stay away from them for a while

name: Sarwar
text: and watch. They, too, will watch.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord, the Lord of Honor, is too exalted to be considered as they describe Him.

name: Sarwar
text: Peace be with the Messengers (of God).

name: Sarwar
text: It is only God, the Lord of the Universe, who deserves all praise.
